name: Karnail Singh Paras
description: '''Karnail Singh Paras''' (28 June 1916 â€“ 28 February 2009) was a Shiromani Kavishar award-winning [[Kavishar]] of [[Punjab, India|Indian Punjab]]. He is the father of former union minister and [[Samajwadi Party]] politician [[Balwant Singh Ramoowalia]] and Canada based writer Iqbal Singh Ramoowalia. One of his granddaughters is married to famous [[Punjabi language|Punjabi]] singer and actor [[Harbhajan Maan]].
